if (NOT SKULD_WIN32)
	macro(set_if_or_not Dest Flag ParaA ParaB)
		if (${Flag})
			set(${Dest} ${ParaA})
		else()
			set(${Dest} ${ParaB})
		endif()
	endmacro()
	set_if_or_not(INCLUDE_INTTYPES_H HAVE_INTTYPES_H 1 0)
	set_if_or_not(INCLUDE_SYS_TYPES_H HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H 1 0)
	set_if_or_not(INCLUDE_STDINT_H HAVE_STDINT_H 1 0)
	set(SIZE16 "int16_t")
	set(USIZE16 "uint16_t")
	set(SIZE32 "int32_t")
	set(USIZE32 "uint32_t")
	set(SIZE64 "int64_t")
	set(USIZE64 "uint64_t")

	configure_file(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/ogg/config_types.h.in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ogg/config_types.h)
endif()
add_library(ogg STATIC src/bitwise.c src/framing.c)
target_include_directories(ogg PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
mark_as_third_party(ogg ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
